alert.note: Alert for Concho; Menard; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 23 at 8:19PM CDT until June 23 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SCHLEICHER...SOUTHEASTERN TOM GREEN...NORTHWESTERN MENARD AND SOUTHWESTERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381 to near Vancourt to 9 miles north of Adams, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Eola around 825 PM CDT. Eden around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Vick, The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 765, Adams and Live Oak. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
